title: Weak Hopf algebras arising from weak matched pairs
authors: Graziela Fonseca, Grasiela Martini and Leonardo Silva
abstract:
This work extends the idea of matched pairs presented by Majid in
\cite{Majid} and Takeuchi in \cite{Takeuchi} for the context of weak bialgebras
and weak Hopf algebras. We introduce, also inspired by partial matched pairs
\cite{matchedpair}, the notion of weak matched pairs and establish conditions
for a subspace of the smash product be a weak bialgebra/Hopf algebra. Further,
some new examples of (co)actions of weak bialgebras over algebras and some
results about integral elements are presented.
